dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
GDAL: Geospatial Data Abstraction Library. GDAL is a translator library
for raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
MIT style Open Source License by the Open Source Geospatial Foundation.
As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data model and single
vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported
formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line utilities
for data translation and processing.
dependencies.name: gdal

dependencies.description:
GEOS (Geometry Engine, Open Source). GEOS is a C/C++ library for
computational geometry with a focus on algorithms used in geographic
information systems (GIS) software. It implements the OGC Simple
Features geometry model and provides all the spatial functions in that
standard as well as many others. GEOS is a core dependency of PostGIS,
QGIS, GDAL, and Shapely.
dependencies.name: geos

dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.
dependencies.name: pil

dependencies.description:
PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software, that transforms
geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to
another. This includes cartographic projections as well as geodetic
transformations.
dependencies.name: proj

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
OWSLib is a Python package for client programming with Open Geospatial
Consortium (OGC) web service (hence OWS) interface standards, and their
related content models.
dependencies.name: py-owslib

dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-packaging

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Provides simple access to https://epsg.io/.
dependencies.name: py-pyepsg

dependencies.description:
Python interface to PROJ (cartographic projections and coordinate
transformations library).
dependencies.name: py-pyproj

dependencies.description:
The Python Shapefile Library (pyshp) reads and writes ESRI Shapefiles in
pure Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyshp

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description:
This is a setuptools_scm plugin that adds support for git archives (for
example the ones GitHub automatically generates).
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm-git-archive

dependencies.description: Manipulation and analysis of geometric objects in the Cartesian plane.
dependencies.name: py-shapely

dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.
dependencies.name: py-six

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
METplus is a verification framework that spans a wide range of temporal
(warn-on-forecast to climate) and spatial (storm to global) scales.
dependent_to.name: metplus

dependent_to.description:
Wavelet and simulated Annealing SliP inversion (WASP). This code uses a
nonlinear simulated annealing inversion method to model slip amplitude,
rake, rupture time, and rise time on a discretized fault plane, finding
the solution that best fits the observations in the wavelet domain.
dependent_to.name: neic-finitefault

dependent_to.description:
Python ARM Radar Toolkit. A growing collection of weather radar
algorithms and utilities build on top of the Scientific Python stack and
distributed under the 3-Clause BSD license. Py-ART is used by the
Atmospheric Radiation Measurement (ARM) Climate Research Facility for
working with data from a number of precipitation and cloud radars, but
has been designed so that it can be used by others in the radar and
atmospheric communities to examine, processes, and analyse data from
many types of weather radars.
dependent_to.name: py-arm-pyart

dependent_to.description:
geoplot is a high-level Python geospatial plotting library. It's an
extension to cartopy and matplotlib which makes mapping easy: like
seaborn for geospatial.
dependent_to.name: py-geoplot

dependent_to.description:
A Python library designed to make data analysis and visualization
seamless and simple.
dependent_to.name: py-geoviews

dependent_to.description: GraphCast: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting.
dependent_to.name: py-graphcast

dependent_to.description:
Collection of tools for reading, visualizing and performing calculations
with weather data.
dependent_to.name: py-metpy

dependent_to.description: Create masks of geospatial regions for arbitrary grids
dependent_to.name: py-regionmask

dependent_to.description:
Xarray extension for unstructured climate and global weather data
analysis and visualization
dependent_to.name: py-uxarray

description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.
name: py-cartopy

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Add support for Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) web service
variants.name: ows
